meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7479.

td.p: Crista Calderon, an instructional technology specialist from Spokane, Washington
Nil Jones, a developer consultant from Portland, Oregon
Rob Liguori, a research editor from Brooklyn, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $40,001)

tr.td: THE NORTHERNMOST SPORTS FRANCHISE
BOATS & BOATING
FOOD & DRINK BRANDS
MIDDLE X
SIR THOMAS MORE
ZOO-TOPIA
